Therefore<S>1352</S> leaving<S>863</S> the principles<S>746</S> of the doctrine<S>3056</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, let us go on<S>5342</S> unto<S>1909</S> perfection<S>5047</S>; not<S>3361</S> laying<S>2598</S> again<S>3825</S> the foundation<S>2310</S> of repentance<S>3341</S> from<S>575</S> dead<S>3498</S> works<S>2041</S>, and<S>2532</S> of faith<S>4102</S> toward<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S>, <sup>principles: or, word of the beginning of</sup>
Of the doctrine<S>1322</S> of baptisms<S>909</S>, and<S>5037</S> of laying on<S>1936</S> of hands<S>5495</S>, and<S>5037</S> of resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>, and<S>2532</S> of eternal<S>166</S> judgment<S>2917</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>5124</S> will we do<S>4160</S>, if<S>1437</S> <S>4007</S> God<S>2316</S> permit<S>2010</S>.
For<S>1063</S> it is impossible<S>102</S> for those who were once<S>530</S> enlightened<S>5461</S>, and<S>5037</S> have tasted<S>1089</S> of the heavenly<S>2032</S> gift<S>1431</S>, and<S>2532</S> were made<S>1096</S> partakers<S>3353</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>,
And<S>2532</S> have tasted<S>1089</S> the good<S>2570</S> word<S>4487</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>5037</S> the powers<S>1411</S> of the world<S>165</S> to come<S>3195</S>,
If<S>2532</S> they shall fall away<S>3895</S>, to renew them<S>340</S> again<S>3825</S> unto<S>1519</S> repentance<S>3341</S>; seeing they crucify<S>388</S> to themselves<S>1438</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> afresh<S>388</S>, and<S>2532</S> put him to an open shame<S>3856</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the earth<S>1093</S> which<S>3588</S> drinketh in<S>4095</S> the rain<S>5205</S> that cometh<S>2064</S> oft<S>4178</S> upon<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> bringeth forth<S>5088</S> herbs<S>1008</S> meet<S>2111</S> for them<S>1565</S> <S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> it is dressed<S>1090</S>, receiveth<S>3335</S> blessing<S>2129</S> from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>: <sup>by: or, for</sup>
But<S>1161</S> that which beareth<S>1627</S> thorns<S>173</S> and<S>2532</S> briers<S>5146</S> is rejected<S>96</S>, and<S>2532</S> is nigh<S>1451</S> unto cursing<S>2671</S>; whose<S>3739</S> end<S>5056</S> is to<S>1519</S> be burned<S>2740</S>.
But<S>1161</S>, beloved<S>27</S>, we are persuaded<S>3982</S> better things<S>2909</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S>, and<S>2532</S> things that accompany<S>2192</S> salvation<S>4991</S>, though<S>1499</S> we<S>2980</S> thus<S>3779</S> speak<S>2980</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> is not<S>3756</S> unrighteous<S>94</S> to forget<S>1950</S> your<S>5216</S> work<S>2041</S> and<S>2532</S> labour<S>2873</S> of love<S>26</S>, which<S>3739</S> ye have shewed<S>1731</S> <S>1731</S> toward<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>, in that ye have ministered<S>1247</S> to the saints<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> do minister<S>1247</S>.
And<S>1161</S> we desire<S>1937</S> that every one<S>1538</S> of you<S>5216</S> do shew<S>1731</S> the same<S>846</S> diligence<S>4710</S> to<S>4314</S> the full assurance<S>4136</S> of hope<S>1680</S> unto<S>891</S> the end<S>5056</S>:
That<S>3363</S> ye be<S>1096</S> not<S>3363</S> slothful<S>3576</S>, but<S>1161</S> followers<S>3402</S> of them who through<S>1223</S> faith<S>4102</S> and<S>2532</S> patience<S>3115</S> inherit<S>2816</S> the promises<S>1860</S>.
For<S>1063</S> when God<S>2316</S> made promise<S>1861</S> to Abraham<S>11</S>, because<S>1893</S> he could<S>2192</S> swear<S>3660</S> by<S>2596</S> no<S>3762</S> greater<S>3187</S>, he sware<S>3660</S> by<S>2596</S> himself<S>1438</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Surely<S>2229</S> <S>3375</S> blessing<S>2127</S> I will bless<S>2127</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> multiplying<S>4129</S> I will multiply<S>4129</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S>, after he had patiently endured<S>3114</S>, he obtained<S>2013</S> the promise<S>1860</S>.
For<S>1063</S> men<S>444</S> verily<S>3303</S> swear<S>3660</S> by<S>2596</S> the greater<S>3187</S>: and<S>2532</S> an oath<S>3727</S> for<S>1519</S> confirmation<S>951</S> is to them<S>846</S> an end<S>4009</S> of all<S>3956</S> strife<S>485</S>.
Wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S>, willing<S>1014</S> more abundantly<S>4054</S> to shew<S>1925</S> unto the heirs<S>2818</S> of promise<S>1860</S> the immutability<S>276</S> of his<S>846</S> counsel<S>1012</S>, confirmed<S>3315</S> it by an oath<S>3727</S>: <sup>confirmed: Gr. interposed himself by</sup>
That<S>2443</S> by<S>1223</S> two<S>1417</S> immutable<S>276</S> things<S>4229</S>, in<S>1722</S> which<S>3739</S> it was impossible<S>102</S> for God<S>2316</S> to lie<S>5574</S>, we might have<S>2192</S> a strong<S>2478</S> consolation<S>3874</S>, who<S>3588</S> have fled for refuge<S>2703</S> to lay hold<S>2902</S> upon the hope<S>1680</S> set before us<S>4295</S>:
Which<S>3739</S> hope we have<S>2192</S> as<S>5613</S> an anchor<S>45</S> of the soul<S>5590</S>, both<S>5037</S> sure<S>804</S> and<S>2532</S> stedfast<S>949</S>, and<S>2532</S> which entereth<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> that within<S>2082</S> the veil<S>2665</S>;
Whither<S>3699</S> the forerunner<S>4274</S> is<S>1525</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S> entered<S>1525</S>, even Jesus<S>2424</S>, made<S>1096</S> an high priest<S>749</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> after<S>2596</S> the order<S>5010</S> of Melchisedec<S>3198</S>.
